Our proposed model.from sentence: Our proposed model achieves the top score on SE2 and are tied with IMS + adapted CW on SE3 .

order.from sentence: Randomizing the order of the input words yields a substantially worse result , which provides evidence for our hypothesis that the order of the words are significant .

consistently improves.from sentence: Moreover , we see that dropword consistently improves the results on both SE2 and SE3 .

makes use of.from sentence: We also see that the system effectively makes use of the information in the pre-trained word embeddings and that they are essential to the performance of our system on these datasets .
